incidents.name: Automated Alert: Minimal Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Voice API issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue on the Voice API. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio Flex and TaskRouter Voice Traffic Failures

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex and TaskRouter voice traffic was degraded for 18 minutes between 12:52 PM and 1:10 PM Pacific Time on 11/09/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced failures in voice traffic. The issue has now been resolved. If you are still experiencing any ongoing issues with calls and notice stuck tasks, we recommend you complete any existing or stuck tasks via the API and try again. You may follow this path: https://taskrouter.twilio.com/v1/Workspaces/WSxxx/Tasks/WTxxx -d AssignmentStatus=Completed.

incidents.name: Low Volume of 500s Returned Instead of 400s for MMS Messages

incident_updates.body: The problem that resulted in a lower occurrence of HTTP 500 errors instead of HTTP 400 errors when sending MMS has been addressed. Our Messaging platform and API are functioning as expected and operating normally at this time.
MMS messages continue to operate normally. We will keep monitoring for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
MMS messages are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified a solution for providing appropriate Twilio error code and http status codes when customers send MMS messages. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified a solution for providing appropriate Twilio error code and http status codes when customers send MMS messages. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified a solution for providing appropriate Twilio error code and http status codes when customers send MMS messages. We expect to provide another update in another 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate the issue with MMS low volume of 500s being returned instead of 400s resulting in unnecessary retries from the customer. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating the issue with MMS low volume of 500s being returned instead of 400s resulting in unnecessary retries from the customer. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio Voice Insights and Video Data Not Available

incident_updates.body: The replay of video quality metrics records has concluded and are available via console, along with the video room summary and event records. The incident is now resolved.

The replay of Voice Insights client events and metrics records has concluded. A subset of records for calls that ended on 11/6/2023 between 10:30 AM and 12:45 PM Pacific Time may be incomplete or missing via the Voice Insights console and REST API. The Event Streams API for the Voice Insights data was not impacted. The replay of Video quality metrics records is still ongoing. Our engineers continue working on replaying the missing data. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio Voice Insights client events and metrics records for calls that ended on 11/6/2023 between 12:00 AM and 12:45 PM Pacific Time are unavailable via the Voice Insights console Dashboard and APIs. Video Insights room summary and event records are now available via console. Backfill of the video quality metrics records is ongoing for rooms that ended between 6AM and 12PM Pacific Time on 11/6/2023. Our engineers are working on replaying the missing data. We'll provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio Voice Insights client events and metrics records for calls that ended on 11/6/2023 between 12:00 AM and 12:45 PM Pacific Time are unavailable via the Voice Insights console Dashboard and APIs. Additionally, Video Insights room summary records as well as room events and metrics records for rooms that ended between 11/5/2023 at 7:00 PM and 11/6/2023 at 12:00 PM are unavailable via the Video Insights console Dashboard. Our engineers continue to work on replaying the missing data. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio Voice Insights client events and metrics records for calls that ended on 11/6/2023 between 12:00 AM and 12:45 PM Pacific Time are unavailable via the Voice Insights console Dashboard and APIs. Additionally, Video Insights room summary records as well as room events and metrics records for rooms that ended between 11/5/2023 at 7:00 PM and 11/6/2023 at 12:00 PM are unavailable via the Video Insights console Dashboard. Our engineers are working on replaying the missing data. We'll provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio Voice Insights client events and metrics records for calls that ended on 11/6/2023 between 12:00 AM and 12:45 PM Pacific Time are unavailable via the Voice Insights console Dashboard and APIs. Additionally, Video Insights room summary records as well as room events and metrics records for rooms that ended between 11/5/2023 at 7:00 PM and 11/6/2023 at 12:00 PM are unavailable via the Video Insights console Dashboard. Our engineers are working on replaying the missing data. We'll provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
